testcase.name: should create a new article and validate article appears in feed
should edit an article and validate changed article text
should find the special article ("Only one article like this")
should add a new follower user and verify the following count increased by one
should log in as the test user
Update the headline and verify the change
should be able to update email and zipcode (my design forces updating both at once)
should have an update password button (really? this was kinda weird...
should display a message when trying to register a new user
should display an error message when not filling out all the registration fields
